main event: Four local residents reported seeing several silvery and metallic 'saucer-like' objects in the sky over Raleigh, N.C. on July 3, 1950.
interesting points: The objects were described as not having windows but appeared to be rotating and flashing., The formation included three or four objects accompanied by a peculiar humming sound., The witnesses observed the objects for several minutes from Poole Boyce Avenue., The objects were reported to be silvery and metallic in appearance but their sizes could not be estimated., The report was categorized as unconventional aircraft by the Air Material Command.
sighted object: several silvery and metallic saucer-like objects
